entry.title: Kindergarten Year A Quarter 4 Episode 1 "Wake Up, Little Girl!"

media:group.media:title: Kindergarten Year A Quarter 4 Episode 1 "Wake Up, Little Girl!"
media:group.media:description: How do you feel when someone you love is sick? What do you do? Memory Verse -- I pray that you may enjoy good health. 3 JOHN 2, NIV. We serve God when we pray for the sick.

entry.title: Kindergarten Year A Quarter 4 Episode 2 "Jesus' Get-well Party"

media:group.media:title: Kindergarten Year A Quarter 4 Episode 2 "Jesus' Get-well Party"
media:group.media:description:
Have you ever had a high fever? Do you remember how it felt to be so hot and sick? A long time ago Jesus helped someone with a high fever.
"I was sick and you looked after me." MATTHEW 25:36, NIV.
We serve God when we help sick people.

entry.title: Kindergarten Year A Quarter 4 Episode 3 "A Hole In The Roof"

media:group.media:title: Kindergarten Year A Quarter 4 Episode 3 "A Hole In The Roof"
media:group.media:description: Some things you just can't do by yourself. And when you need a friend to help you, you're always glad when one is there. But would your friends cut a hole in the roof for you? Memory Verse -- There is a friend who sticks closer than a brother. PROVERBS 18:24, NIV. We serve God when we help others.

entry.title: Kindergarten Year A Quarter 4 Episode 4 "Now I Can See!"

media:group.media:title: Kindergarten Year A Quarter 4 Episode 4 "Now I Can See!"
media:group.media:description:
When something wonderful happens to you, whom do you tell about it? A long time ago something wonderful happened to a blind man. Whom do you think he told?
"One thing I do know. I was blind but now I see!" JOHN 9:25, NIV.
We serve God when we tell others what He has done for us.

entry.title: Kindergarten Year A Quarter 4 Episode 5 "Young Man, Get Up"

media:group.media:title: Kindergarten Year A Quarter 4 Episode 5 "Young Man, Get Up"
media:group.media:description:
Have you ever felt really sad about something? So sad that you cried? That's how the mother in our story today felt.
"God has come to help his people." LUKE 7:16, NIV
We serve God when we help people who are sad.

entry.title: Kindergarten Year A Quarter 4 Episode 6 "The Lost Sheep"

media:group.media:title: Kindergarten Year A Quarter 4 Episode 6 "The Lost Sheep"
media:group.media:description:
Have you ever been in a store or at a park, and when you looked up you couldn't see your parents? Did you feel lost? Did you cry? You probably felt like the sheep in a story Jesus once told.
"[Jesus says,] You can be sure that I will be with you always." MATTHEW 28:20, ICB.
Jesus watches over us all the time.

entry.title: Kindergarten Year A Quarter 4 Episode 7 "Lost And Found"

media:group.media:title: Kindergarten Year A Quarter 4 Episode 7 "Lost And Found"
media:group.media:description:
Have you ever lost your favorite toy? Did you look every place you could think of? Your lost toy is like a coin in a story Jesus told.
"[God] said, I love you . . . with a love that will last forever." JEREMIAH 31:3, ICB.
We are important and precious to God.

entry.title: Kindergarten Year A Quarter 4 Episode 8 "The Naughty Son"

media:group.media:title: Kindergarten Year A Quarter 4 Episode 8 "The Naughty Son"
media:group.media:description:
Have you ever disobeyed your parents? How did you feel about what you had done? Did you wonder if they would still love you?
"You, Lord, are good, and ready to forgive." PSALM 86:5, NKJV. God is always ready to forgive us.

entry.title: Kindergarten Year A Quarter 4 Episode 9 "The Big Big Tree"

media:group.media:title: Kindergarten Year A Quarter 4 Episode 9 "The Big Big Tree"
media:group.media:description:
Have you ever planted a seed? Did it grow fast or slow? Short or tall? Are you growing?
Key Verse -- Grow in the grace. . . of . . . Jesus. 2 PETER 3:18, NIV.
God's love helps us grow to be more like Him.

entry.title: Kindergarten Year A Quarter 4 Episode 10 "The First Christmas"

media:group.media:title: Kindergarten Year A Quarter 4 Episode 10 "The First Christmas"
media:group.media:description:
Have you ever been on a long trip? Have you wished you could stop and rest? A long time ago Mary and Joseph traveled to a city called Bethlehem. That trip changed their lives.
"Thanks be to God for his . . . gift!" 2CORINTHIANS 9:15, NIV.
We worship God when we thank Him for sending Jesus to earth.

entry.title: Kindergarten Year A Quarter 4 Episode 11 "The First Christmas Song"

media:group.media:title: Kindergarten Year A Quarter 4 Episode 11 "The First Christmas Song"
media:group.media:description:
What do you do when something really wonderful happens? Do you want to tell someone else? Do you ever feel like singing?
"Every perfect gift is from God." JAMES 1:17, ICB. Jesus is
God's precious gift to us.
more at www.gracelink.net

entry.title: Kindergarten Year A Quarter 4 Episode 12 "The Shepherds Find Baby Jesus"

media:group.media:title: Kindergarten Year A Quarter 4 Episode 12 "The Shepherds Find Baby Jesus"
media:group.media:description:
Have you ever hoped for something special, such as a certain birthday present? Did you get it?
"The Lord has done great things for us." PSALM 126:3, NIV.
We worship Jesus when we tell others about Him.
more at www.gracelink.net

entry.title: Kindergarten Year A Quarter 4 Episode 13 "Birthday Presents For Jesus"

media:group.media:title: Kindergarten Year A Quarter 4 Episode 13 "Birthday Presents For Jesus"
media:group.media:description:
Have you ever given someone the perfect birthday present? How did you feel when that person opened your gift?
"God loves a cheerful giver." 2 CORINTHIANS 9:7, NIV.
We worship Jesus when we bring our offerings to Him.
